texts.biography: In the crucible of conflict, bereft of his throne and people, Shayanâ€™s spirit remained unbroken. Fueled by a solemn vow to forge a new sanctuary for the left behind, he united others by his vision. Thus, Refuge blossomed into a beacon of hope, embodying the resilience and unity of those who refused to yield to the ravages of despair.
